Package org.openhab.binding.lcn

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LCNBinding<P extends LCNBindingProvider>
    This class handles all necessary traffic from and to LCNModules.
    LCNBinding.Credentials
    Represents a single username-password combination.
    LCNBinding.FirmwareJob
    Used to reliably gather firmware information.
    LCNBinding.PingJob
    A simple Job that will Ping the PCK software every now and again, to make sure, that channels are not closed.
    LCNBinding.ReconnectChannelJob
    A simple QuartzJob to reconnect channels.
    LCNBinding.RequestJob
    A simple Job that will request data for modules, which do not support auto-updates.
    LCNBindingProvider
    This class handles item binding definitions.
    LCNRequestList
    Represents a list of LCNInputModules that require repeated status requests in order to be maintained.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LCNBinding.Credentials.DimMode
